document_data.mainbody:
oska Urgray was an enforcer of the Xanathars Thieves Guild in Waterdeep during the early 1490s DR.
Noska was the chief enforcer for the Xanathar. He lived inside the beholders lair. During the gladiator tournaments organized by his master, Noska managed the fighters.
Once Noska lost his left hand and forearm to a green slimes attack. He replaced the missing part with a heavy crossbow attached to the stump.
In 1492 DR, if the Xanathar managed to obtain the Stone of Golorr, he entrusted the Stone to Grinda Garloth. She agreed to take custody of the Stone but changed her mind and decided to use it for herself, ordering her familiar to hide it. Noska led a band of the Xanathars minions to besiege Grinda in order to steal back the Stone.
Noska was one of the most trusted underlings of the Xanathar.
